The hotel is directly off the 405, making it convenient for John Wayne Airport. They don't offer room service (delivery is available from local restaurants) but there are several chain places about a 10-minute walk away. The free breakfast is awesome with a friendly chef (Carolyn) who cooks to order and brightens the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Dave P,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review. We are so thrilled to know that you appreciated our accommodations, delicious breakfast options, friendly team, and convenient locations. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach the night we got married. The night before, I stayed there with a few of my bridesmaids. It was a wonderful stay. The hotel staff are friendly and so accommodating. I felt like I could trust them. Also, the complimentary breakfast at the hotel is incredible!!!
Manager Response: Dear Sherry D Campo,  Congratulations on your recent nuptials! We are happy to have been able to accommodate you leading up to and on your special day. We are proud to have a friendly team as well as our delicious complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back for another pleasant stay in the near future.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I have come here to this hotel before for training at the nearby WestEd building.  I booked several nights for my daughter and I to visit CSU Long Beach and the Aquarium of the Pacific.  Not only is the location great, but the entire staff is amazing!  The level of service from front desk, dining, and cleaning is top-notch, friendly and always willing to help in any way possible.  Definitely the best part of our visit to Southern California!
Manager Response: Dear Patrick C.,  Thank you for your fantastic review! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service from our friendly team and that you had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious breakfast and convenient location. We hope to welcome you back for another pleasant stay soon.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The Ayres Hotel Seal Beach is a wonderful experience. All of the staff go the extra mile to ensure our stay is comfortable and pleasant.  Carolyn prepares a beautiful breakfast for the guests with personal service, and she makes mornings amazing with her bubbly personality.  She is a wonderful addition to the staff. My sisters and I have been staying at the Ayres for our yearly getaway for many years and have always enjoyed exceptional service.  Plus it's beautiful there!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  I appreciate you taking the time to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Ayres Hotel Seal Beach. Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our accommodations and team! I am glad to hear Carolyn made your stay extra memorable. Thank you for continuing to be a guest with Ayres Hotels.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Did not have a reservation. Arrived late in the evening. The customer service is excellent. Brent took care of us, and our check-in was seamless. The hotel has a unique decor, rooms clean and well-appointed, and family friendly! The breakfast is great. The chef, Carolyn, is awesome. Her pancakes are delicious. Upon checking-out, I had the pleasure of speaking with the general manager who clearly takes pride in taking care of her guests. When I travel back to CA, I will definitely be back.

We had an excellent experience with the staff at Ayres Hotel in Seal Beach.  In particular Adam and Daniel at the front desk.  Also we were amazed by Caroline who was cooking a delicious breakfast and entertaining us too.  She is amazing!  The rooms were clean although the carpet in our room had a stain - they just need to deep clean it I think.  I was pleasantly surprised at how quiet the rooms were.

Loved this little spot.  Very inviting, comfortable, clean, and the staff was both courteous and friendly.    I booked this hotel after our two day visit at Disneyland.  Its about 30 mins from Disneyland and 11 minutes from the beach.  Absolutely perfect.

The hotel staff was pleasant upon checking in. I was pleasantly surprised with the complimentary breakfast. The kitchen staff made omelets and there were a variety of hot foods including French toast and pancakes. We would definitely come back and use this hotel.

The breakfast was fabulous due to a fun and great chef named Carolyn. Keep rocking lady! The room was clean and tidy upon arrival.  The staff is also friendly. Easy access to freeway and shops. We would stay here again.

We have stayed at this location twice now, as our son will be attending CSULB in the fall.  The property is perfectly located near restaurants, shopping, the beach, and the college.  The grounds are well maintained, the rooms and interior always spotless, and the staff is always friendly and helpful.  Breakfast is so good, and the chef (I believe her name is Carolyn by the other reviews) is SO NICE!  She greets every guest, remembers if they are returning, is genuine in conversation, and so upbeat!  She makes early breakfast enjoyable!  Ayres Seal Beach will be our home away from home when we visit our son at Long Beach State.  Looking forward to our next visit in August!

We stayed here for the weekend. Upon arrival the staff was extremely pleasant and check-in was quick and easy. Our room was located on the first floor next to the courtyard. We were right next to the pool. If you do not want to hear noise I highly recommend getting a room on an upper level away from the court yard. We didn‚Äôt mind it because we were gone most of the day. The courtyard is great to allow children to run around while adults relax from a long day. The complimentary breakfast was wonderful! The blond female chef was so friendly and helpful every morning! They had so many options for breakfast which was convenient for adults and picky children!  The only recommendation I have is to call to get your room cleaned at a certain time. I expected the room to be cleaned

Summary Heading: We didn‚Äôt expect that the breakfast would be so good
Summary: A nice surprise was that Not only was it good, Carolyn the chef was entertaining, super friendly and really good at what she does. pancakes, Omelets, French toast and more. Oh and the room was pretty nice too...

Without a doubt we will be back! Great location, staff has incredible almost over the top customer service, comfortable beds with clean rooms. I had an absolute dream of a stay‚ÄîCarolyn who made breakfast each morning was so friendly and made a point to greet each guest. My next trip to the LA area will include a return trip to the Ayres Seal Beach!! Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  We are honored to be your new favorite and we appreciate your kind compliments. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service from our friendly team, as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. Carolyn is an incredible asset to our team and I'm proud to read that she made your stay that much more memorable. We hope that your travels bring you back to us soon.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The staff was very nice upon check in and check out.  The complimentary breakfast was very good with lots of options to choose from both cold and hot.  The people working the breakfast were very friendly - a nice way to start a busy work day.   My room was clean and comfortable - located at the end of the hall so pretty quiet too. All in all a pleasant stay and I would recommend to others.
Manager Response: Dear Mary C.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review. It is a delight to see that you had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious breakfast and found our team to be friendly and our rooms comfortable. We appreciate you visiting and hope that your travels bring you back to us soon.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The property was clean. The beds were very comfortable. And the breakfast was great. The chef in the morning was so nice. The kids loved the pool.  I was less than thrilled with some rowdy guests during our stay. The hotel manager reached out to me and seemed genuinely concerned about my visit... That rarely happens nowadays. I was impressed with his commitment to hospitality. It spoke volumes about the property and the brand.
Manager Response: Dear Zashleyz,  Thank you for visiting Ayres Hotels. I would like to sincerely apologize that your time with us was anything less than exceptional. I have taken this opportunity to discuss your concerns regarding noise with our entire team and I am so pleased to know that you were happy with the way this was resolved. We truly appreciate your insight and thank you for your compliments to our clean and comfortable accommodations, along with our delicious complimentary breakfast. We hope you consider staying with us again in the future so that we can demonstrate to you an absolutely comfortable and welcoming experience. Thank you again for your kind rating and review!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We spent one night, when arrived the service was excellent and fast. The hotel was clean and nice, the room was very clean well equipped and quiet. The next morning the breakfast was excellent, the best I‚Äôve ever had. I would stay here again hands down!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a kind rating and review. We are pleased to see that you enjoyed the exceptional service our friendly team provides, as well as our complimentary full American breakfast. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The hotel is beautiful and the location of the hotel is perfect. 20 minutes to Disneyland, Long Beach, and Huntington Beach in all three directions. The breakfasts are delicious and cooked perfectly, with lots of choices. We will probably be staying here for all future trips to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for visiting! I appreciate you taking the time to share your review. It was a pleasure to welcome you to Ayres Hotels and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you again the next time that your travels bring you to Seal Beach!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Ayers hotel in Seal Beach has a wonderful staff who are very friendly and helpful.   The rooms are extremely comfortable and have everything you need for a pleasant stay.  Location is near freeway and tons of shops. Just a few miles to the water and wonderful restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Tom G,  We are glad to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent visit to Seal Beach! Thank you for your fantastic review, I am pleased to know you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to having you as our guest again.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I had a wonderful 4-day stay at Ayres in Seal Beach for my niece's wedding.  When I arrived in town, I was not feeling well and they let me check in early so I could rest and feel better.  The hotel is beautiful and clean and everyone on their staff was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad to see that we were able to accommodate an early check-in for you. Thank you for your kind words regarding our hotel and exceptional service. We would love to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Great customer Service! The ladies in the front desk was very nice. The chef was very friendly and seeing enjoying her job.  The room was clean and bed was comfortable. Location was fair. The area is not tourist area but it seeing safe, few blocks from restaurant and shopping center.

Summary Heading: Great stays at Ayres Seal Beach
Summary: Always enjoy my stays at Ayres Seal Beach - accessible room and parking, great breakfast, friendly staff and impeccable service. Double 5 stars for staff: I‚Äôm a frequent visitor and they remember my preferences and special needs, making my stays even more comfortable and enjoyable. Highly recommended.

Summary Heading: A convenient choice for North Orange County or Long Beach area
Summary: This property is located at the junction of the 405, 605 and 22 freeways and is a very convenient and comfortable choice. The rooms are a good size and the morning breakfast offers many options. The breakfast buffet server was friendly and really enjoyed her job. She tried to accommodate any special requests with a warm smile. Regardless of what time you arrive for breakfast, it was well stocked and food is fresh right off the stove. No silly resort fees or additional hotel taxes to hike up the price either.

Summary Heading: Don't book for your wedding night
Summary: Room not ready for check-in  at 2;00pm. Nothing special done for honeymoon suite - not even a chocolate laid out. Guy at check in - miserable and not very helpful. Wouldn't recommend for family/couples.
Manager Response: Dear Nikola D,  I would like to sincerely apologize that your time with us was anything less than exceptional. Our check-in time is 3pm and, unfortunately, anything before that cannot be guaranteed. After reviewing your reservation, I did not see any special requests or notes stating this would be your honeymoon unfortunately. Please accept our most sincere apologies concerning the inconveniences you experienced within your room, along with any inconsistencies you experienced in regards to receiving exceptional guest service. We truly hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future for a more enjoyable stay.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: My new ‚Äúgo to‚Äù hotel for Southern California.
Summary: I have a small business in Seal Beach but recently moved out of town and needed somewhere to stay when I‚Äôm here working. I‚Äôm a self proclaimed hotel snob and super picky about clean above all else.  Ayers was great. Great location! Very clean! Rooms were nice and it‚Äôs surprisingly quiet. Breakfast staff was delightful. My only small request would be to have more gluten free options but overall way above what most hotels offer for breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa K.,  Thank you for your fantastic review and rating of the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach! We are pleased to see that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay and that you enjoyed our optimal location, clean accommodations, and peaceful atmosphere. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Great customer service starting with the front desk staff.  Our room was clean and the bed was comfortable.The breakfast selections are outstanding.  Added to everything is the convenience to the 405. How could you ask for more?
Manager Response: Dear Carol V,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay. We are thrilled to have been able to accommodate you during your recent visit to Seal Beach. We are delighted to have impressed you with our world-class service and comfortable accommodations. I hope we have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel, quality furnishings and lovely comfortable bedrooms
Summary: Overall i cannot fault the hotel, the quality furnishings bedroom design comfort-ability. its location to where i was working was superb. I only wish this hotel even had a small bar or honesty bar where you could relax and have a drink in the evening and that it had an evening meal service. I appreciate there are two restaurants within walking distance, but something altogether less formal would be a real advantage.

Summary Heading: Always a trusted place to stay
Summary: Ayres continues to prove to me they are a leader in lodging industry in California.  Rooms are always modern, clean, fresh smelling, and well maintained.  It's no surprise that they continue to expand outside of their SoCal base.  I just wish they'd open a couple of properties in Fresno.  I tell family, friends, and business colleagues all the same - BOOK AYRES!  AND the breakfasts are excellent!  The cook at the Seal Beach property is awesome, and staff always seem genuinely friendly and concerned for your total satisfaction.  Oh and did I mention the great value vs. the national chains.  Thanks Ayres.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your wonderful review and compliments to our well-appointed accommodations and team members! We are pleased to know that we were able to accommodate you during your recent stay. It is a delight to know that you also had the opportunity to enjoy our delicious breakfast and found our team to be friendly and helpful. We look forward to having you as our guest again!  Sincerely,  Steve DeLugo General Manager

Summary: We've stayed at the Ayres at this location before. The hotel has an upscale feel, and is close to restaurants, shopping and the 405/605 freeway interchange. Rooms are decorated well, and the ambiance is more old world (in a good way). On this occasion, though, we were on the second floor, and a guest above us apparently thought his room doubled as a gym or pacing location. He tromped around until late, and then arose and started again at about 0430. I'm in hotels 200 nights a year, so I know it likely isn't intentional, and I was too tired to request a change in rooms.  Breakfast is very good, above the level you usually find. They have a good array of hot and cold items, and a cook for omelettes and pancakes. Overall very good.
Manager Response: Dear Bob H,  Thank you for continuing to be a guest at Ayres Hotels. We are happy to have been able to accommodate you during your recent stay. Though I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary full American breakfast, I would like to sincerely apologize for any noise that woke you up. We appreciate your candid feedback and hope to welcome you back for an exceptional stay in the future.  Sincerely,  Steve DeLugo General Manager

Summary: Not being familiar with the brand I was not sure what to expect.  The hotel is located off 405 about 10-15 minutes from Long Beach airport.  Staff is very friendly from front desk to the wonderful chef who made me an omelette.  Rooms are large and very clean. The hotel itself is very clean!  I had a wonderful experience.  Would highly recommend Ayres Seal Beach property.

The room was large and comfortable. Wifi worked well. The place is not trendy, but quite nice. Convenient (by car) to shopping. And it has the most impressive free breakfast I have ever seen.  They have a cook making fresh pancakes, eggs, as well as refreshing the egg whites with spinach and tomato scrambly.

I‚Äôve been coming here for almost two years now and I have to say the service here is extraordinary. The place is gorgeous, always nice and clean and the staff goes out of their way to accommodate you!!! Their breakfast is delicious and always fresh. I‚Äôm lactose intolerant and they go out of their way to get me almond milk every time I‚Äôm here. Thank you Daniel and thank you to the kitchen staff for accommodating my special request.  You guys are awesome üëçüèª
Manager Response: Dear nursenorma0425,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are happy that you have returned to stay at Ayres Hotel Seal Beach numerous times over the last couple of years and that you have had an exceptional experience each time. It is with great pleasure that we provide the best experiences for our guests and we look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: It's an awesome, clean, great Service hotel directly across the street from Spaggettini's.  I normally spend the Saturday night before the Sunday Brunch.  Spending the Sunday night is also good incase you drink much champagne.  I also love the fact that this hotel provides a discount to use at Spaggs.  Enjoy!
Manager Response: Dear lanitai,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you have returned to stay with us and found the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach to be a great location to stay at while visiting Spaghettini. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I have to say that this place went beyond what I expected. First off, the room was so spacious. I had room 321 and it was a corner room. The ceilings were high, king bed, living room area, small kitchenette area, desk area and a large bathroom section. What I really wanted to comment on were these standout things: 1. The room was immaculately clean, and I have an OCD so believe me I check. I didn't even find a piece of hair in the corners of the baseboards! Yup that clean! I was so impressed I wrote a letter thanking the housekeeping crew when I left! 2. The complimentary breakfast rocked. it had alot of options and I liked how they had the cooks open to meet and greet us as they were replenishing the trays with french toast and eggs right off the grill. Nice touch to bring the
Manager Response: Dear Michelle B,  Thank you for your kind rating and thoughtful review! We are thrilled to know that you found our guestrooms spacious and immaculately clean. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our guests and we are glad that we successfully did just that for you. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Rooms & facilities were clean and the staff were outstanding! Morning breakfast had a variety of items and the staff were accommodating to both early and late arrivals.  Location is convenient to shopping and dining.  Multiple highway access within minutes of hotel   Seal Beach and Long Beach are a short distance.
Manager Response: Dear Poppygreenacres,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you had a comfortable stay with us and that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Great location. Pleasant staff. Great breakfast.
Summary: Stayed recently at this hotel. It is located right off the highway. Very close to Long Beach Airport. We visited the Queen Mary and the Aquarium of the Pacific from here.  Enjoyed the hot tub. Clean, large, and warm. Just what we wanted.  Breakfast was outstanding for a free breakfast. Ample quantities, good choices, tables cleaned promptly.  Will visit again, thanks.
Manager Response: Dear NVSoxFan,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us. We are glad to see you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our hotel to be in a stellar location. We look forward to welcoming you back for an exceptional stay sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The hotel was clean and the staff welcoming.  However there is no bar and the restaurant is not open every day.  I was really disappointed. Apparently there are plans to start the restaurant and bar again, but that was no use to me.  The staff were very apologetic.  I just wish I had checked this hotel more thoroughly as it was no a cheap place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear totallynoname,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are glad to see that you were pleased with the cleanliness of our hotel and that you found our team members welcoming. I would like to send my sincere apology for any inconvenience you may have experienced in regards to us not having an onsite restaurant and bar. Your feedback is valued as we strive to provide our guests with exceptional experiences. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: From the website, I thought this would be a nicer hotel. It really needs a restaurant and bar! The rooms could use a little updating and they need a gift shop with more items, like snacks. Lovely outside patio but this hotel is bare bones as far as amenities are concerned. Wouldn‚Äôt stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear maryleonilda,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us. I would like to send my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced during your time with us. We strive to provide our guests with exceptional experiences and appreciate your candid insight regarding the amenities we should offer. We value your feedback and hope to welcome you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

My choice of breakfast for the last 2 of 4

Room was large, bathroom-tub and toilet-very clean. Sink was outside the bathroom area. Opposite the sink is a mini fridge, microwave and single cup coffee maker.  Down the hall, there is a washer/dryer - $3 per.  Free WiFi works well. Great hot breakfast with good choices is included. Manager Response: Dear Susan C,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location and that you had an overall comfortable stay. When we entered the room, it was a very spacious 2 bedroom with a large vanity area, bar area, and bathroom.  Beds were super comfy and quiet at night.  Monday - Wednesday they had a evening reception which had soda, wine, beer, and snacks such as chips, dip, veggies, etc.  Breakfast was also very good with pancakes, sausage, bacon, fruit, pastries, cereal, yogurt, etc.  You could eat in the dining room or go right out the doors and sit in the patio which then leads to the nice pool.  My daughters loved the

Summary Heading: Very clean and easy to get to

It was clean and stocked and probably one of the best hotels I have stayed at. I felt safe and comfortable. The continental breakfast was 'made to order' per say , plentiful and very delicious. Enough variety everyone can enjoy. There is complimentary cookies and water throughout the day. The staff was friendly and helpful. Would definately stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Amber B,  Thank you for your kind review! We are delighted to see that you had an exceptional stay with us and found our hotel to be comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Very Beautiful Hotel with the finest Breakfast. Really Enjoyed the jacuzzi hot tub bath. I like the lobby space, it's very decent and feels like we are in a palace. nice location and near to seal beach.

Quaint moderately sized hotel with an old school elegant & colonial feel. Check in was seamless and their texting option was great.  Our early check in was easily accommodated. Affordable stay for a holiday week plus a grand breakfast spread with cooking right before your eyes...more on this later. We stayed in a double Queen room (on 3rd floor) that we were surprised was so big...the high ceilings surely helped.  The beds were so comfortable, perfectly firm & soft, no sinking in and my legs didn't fall off the bed. I'm not freakishly tall (5'9") but most beds in affordable hotels in Cali are too short for me. The light switch was interesting because you had to slide your room key into it for it to work... this proved better as we didn't misplace our room key! It was well lit
Manager Response: Dear Monique MQ,  Thank you for your thoughtful review on your recent stay with us! We are delighted that you found our rooms to be comfortable and that you had an overall enjoyable experience. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This is the third time we have stayed at the Ayres, Seal Beach. It is a great hotel. The decor is quiet and very tasteful. The rooms are clean, quiet and very comfortable. The shower pressure was great. The breakfasts were super, something for everyone. The dining room is clean and comfortable, and one can take breakfast into the courtyard, which is very pleasant. The staff are very friendly,but not at all intrusive. Though the hotel was fairly full, it was quiet. The beds and pillows are very comfortable. We took a 15 minute walk to a shopping complex which has such shops as Bed, Bath and Beyond and others. We really love this hotel.

I had no idea what to expect with this hotel since I booked it as a mystery hotel on Hotwire. Let me say I was pleasantly surprised. The rooms were very spacious and clean. They had a refrigerator and microwave in the room. The bathroom was clean. Staff was excellent! Breakfast was included and was great!! I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this hotel!!

This place was well worth the money spent. Great room. Bed was so comfortable. Staff was nice and friendly. Breakfast was great and not the traditional continental they had a whole buffet of fresh veggies and eggs and French toast cooked right there in front of you. Great hotel.

Summary Heading: Large spacious rooms, very clean, awesome breakfast!
Summary: We were in town for a few family events and the hotel was amazing! Large spacious rooms, comfortable beds and an awesome breakfast buffet. My only issue was with the shower - the water came out in a mist and when you have a lot of hair, it made for a very long shower, LOL. The staff was friendly and the hotel is very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle J,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad to see that you found our rooms to be spacious and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Your feedback on the water pressure in our showers is appreciated as it helps us to better improve our amenities for future guests. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Luxurious room at a bargain price
Summary: We loved our stay at this hotel.  Our room (two Queen beds with a partition) was spotless, well appointed, and comfortable with a large refrigerator and big, fluffy towels.  It's located in an unattractive commercial area right off the freeway, but it doesn't feel so suburban inside the gorgeous lobby.  Excellent, friendly staff.  Breakfast was a highlight in a lovely dining room with lots of choices.  Unlike many chain hotels that use disposable plates and cutlery, this hotel offers ceramic plates and bowls with metal cutlery. This makes a huge difference to me since I really like using as few items that go into the landfill as possible.
Manager Response: Dear Skaerje,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you had an exceptional stay with us and you enjoyed all that our complimentary breakfast has to offer. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Not much different than a holiday inn express. Enjoyed the room.  Location of hotel was perfect for us being that we were dining at Spaghettinis the next morning.  Staff friendly.  went out at 5 am to enjoy fire and it was not on, disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Trish G,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay! We are glad you enjoyed the room and found our hotel to be in a stellar location for your needs. I would like to send my sincere apologies that we did not have our fire going at the time you were looking forward to. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This was the 9th time we have stayed at this hotel. They have never disappointed us. The service is always friendly and accommodating. Our requests are handled quickly and professionally. The room is always clean. The full breakfast has many options to fill up on and tastes great. It feels like a second home to us. My son and daughter like to call it the hometel.
Manager Response: Dear Cory H,  Thank you for your kind review. We are happy that you've enjoyed each of your stays with us and have found our hotel to be your home away from home. We look forward to welcoming you the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel was really nice. I booked the hotel for one night for a wedding that i was going to. The beds were so comfortable and i love how the bathroom/shower was separate from the sink. It was great to know that check out was at 12PM giving us a good amount of time to clean up. Breakfast was delicious!
Manager Response: Dear ibot G,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Tesla destination charger was a highlight!
Summary: We stayed only one night, but the noon checkout was great for us. We were able to charge up our Tesla overnight with the destination charger, saving us lots of time the next day.  The breakfast was tasty. Enjoyed the potatoes and eggs. Lots of choices for hot or cold breakfast foods. Our room was very clean and comfortable. We did not try out the pool, but it looked inviting. The fitness room is quite small, but works. We would stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear cls79,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you enjoyed a comfortable stay with us and that our Tesla chargers were very helpful in getting you set for your next destination. If you are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights for pre and post wedding festivities - great decision! We loved the... - friendly & helpful customer service - beautiful rooms - perfect adjoining rooms (suite) for bridal party preparations - good, included breakfast - free and easy parking - safe area - variety of restaurants, pharmacies, and shops around - fitness room
Manager Response: Dear Janelle G,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad to see that you found our hotel to be beautiful and enjoyed the amenities we offer to our valued guests. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Large quiet rooms, comfortable bedding, fridge, microwave, coffee maker, all apple chargers, amazing American breakfast, lots of free parking spot even with charger for electric cars. Just a perfect room for awesome price. Ayres will be my first choice from now on. And electric charger parking spot.
Manager Response: Dear fxartist,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you found our guestrooms to be exceptional and of great value. We are grateful to be your new chosen hotel and look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Excellent value. Room and hotel was very nice compared to similarly priced hotels. Breakfast was selfserve buffet style in a very nice dining room. Full breakfast too - not the usual skimpy free hotel breakfast. I only wished we discovered the Ayres in Los Alamitos where we stayed sooner. Forgot to day that there was a fridge and microwave in the room also.
Manager Response: Dear peasinapodsc,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad to see that you found our hotel to be of great value and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We wish we had the opportunity to welcome you sooner, but we definitely look forward to having you with us again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We had a large group for our sons College graduation from Cal State Long Beach.  This hotel was AWESOME!!!  They were so accommodating and gave us a visitors discount for coing to the graduation.  Everyone went out of their way to help us in any way possible.

We've been visiting Seal Beach for many years and always stop at the Ayres Hotel.  It is particularly convenient because it is very close to family residence and places we visit while we're in town.  The accommodations, breakfast, and service are excellent.
Manager Response: Dear gamahan,  Thank you for your kind review! We are grateful to see that you have returned to stay with us over the years and have been satisfied with the stellar service we provide. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Very convenient location off of 405 and close to the industrial parks in Garden Grove for us to work.  Still only a few miles from the beach...very handy for evening walks in beautiful Huntington Beach.  I liked that the hotel was close to shopping and restaurants so that some could stay behind in the evenings and walk to dinner.  Free breakfast was the best free breakfast in the U.S. I've had since I stayed at the last Ayres Hotel nearby.  Beds and room are quite comfortable; bathroom is modern and clean.  Highly recommend.

Summary Heading: Pleasantly Surprised-patio, pool & breakfast all winners!
Summary: My husband and I just needed a few days here while renovations were happening on our home.   This place was perfect. Quiet. Clean. The rooms were spacious and attractive. Loved the pool and people aren‚Äôt wrong about the complementary breakfast...wow!  In Room coffee makers, comfy bed and our king suite room opened to a little outdoor area (quite public, no privacy but still pleasant). Well maintained and a fountain to distract from the traffic sounds.   The few hiccups were the king suite (ground floor) opens to a bigger outdoor patio area where smokers hang out. Ick. Had to close the slider a couple times to keep the smell out.   It‚Äôs freeway-close and a busy part of town. Can easily walk to Sprouts! Very convenient! Not walking distance to the beach or the shops at Seal
Manager Response: Dear SJWolf66,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our rooms to be spacious. If you are ever in need of a place to stay again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This is our go to hotel when in the area. We can count on it always being clean and comfortable.  The staff is awesome! They are quick to smile, always say hi and very responsive to any needs that come up.  And a great breakfast to boot!
Manager Response: Dear 44hogan1,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that we are your chosen back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent bed and pillows.  Very comfortingg and relaxing
Summary: It was close to close to shopping and good restaurants.  There is plenty of on site parking space in a safe neighborhood.  The room and the place was immaculately clean.  O would recommend it highly for business travelers as well as for families.

I stay at Ayres Hotel a few times a year.  The environment is always clean, comfortable, elegant, and inviting.  Most importantly, staff is always professional, courteous, extremely helpful, and friendly.  Love the complimentary breakfast, too!  Lots of variety.   The pool and Jacuzzi are a great way to end a long day.

We spent one night at the Ayres Hotel while on a quick trip to Seal Beach to attend a family event. Check in was quick and the staff member was friendly. We weren't happy with our first room as it was a handicapped room. The front desk was able to find us another room which although was on the ground floor, which is not our favorite location, it was quite nice. We had a patio on a small courtyard. It was pleasant. The beds were comfortable and the room was nicely appointed. The hot breakfast was very good, with many options  including eggs, sausage, potatoes, fruit, French toast and pancakes along with the usual continental selections. There was a person continuously cooking the hot items right there in the dining room. Every staff member we met during our stay was friendly and
Manager Response: Dear mrsslk,  Thank you for your kind review on your recent stay! We are glad that we were able to get you situated in a room type that better suited your needs and that you had an overall comfortable stay. It is with great pleasure that we provide our guests with exceptional experiences at our hotel and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The Ayers Hotel has a lot going for it. First, there's plenty of free parking. It's quiet - the corridors are carpeted and the room doors don't slam shut. The room was large with plenty of storage space and the bed was extremely comfortable with a good choice of pillows. There were plenty of power sockets and points for USB leads. The shower was easy to operate and very effective. The hotel serves a good buffet breakfast. Lastly, all the staff we met were very friendly and helpful. The very good Spaghetini restaurant is just over the road.
Manager Response: Dear winchesterman,  Thank you for your kind review on your recent stay! We are delighted to see that you found our hotel to be spacious, comfortable, and of great value. All of our team members hope to welcome you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Very comfortable with a touch of class
Summary: Stayed in a courtyard room and found it to be very quiet. Room was huge as were the beds. Liked the stylish touches with paintings and furniture which elevated our experience above a normal chain hotel. Pool and hot tub were very pleasant even on a cool evening. Towels were provided by the pool. Breakfast was a relaxed affair and good quality. It was made even more enjoyable by being served with real cutlery and crockery - can't be doing with plastic and paper.
Manager Response: Dear MistyTT,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay! We are delighted to see that you found our rooms to be quiet and spacious. It is with great pleasure that we provide our guests with an exceptional experience at our hotel and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The service at this hotel is great.  We asked for early check in and the desk was very helpful with this request.  The rooms are clean, roomy and our room near the end of the hall was very quiet.  The free breakfast was much better than most, so we were very impressed.  There is lots of shopping within walking distance and the desk was very helpful every time I asked for a suggestion on where to go.
Manager Response: Dear whampel,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay! We are glad you found our accommodations to be spacious and that you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another exceptional experience!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Stayed here for 4 nights while visiting family. The hotel is located in Seal Beach right off the 405. Room was clean with a King bed and pull out sofa. Breakfast was great with fruit, cereal, scrambled eggs and egg whites, pancakes, French toast, sausage patties and links, variety of bread choices and juices. Monday - Wednesday nights, about 5 PM, there is a Happy Bar in the breakfast area. Nice seating outside. There's and outdoor pool. The staff was very professional and friendly. I definitely recommend.

Lovely hotel. Beautiful rooms, nice employees, easy parking, great complimentary breakfast.  It was a pleasure to stay at the Ayres Hotel.  They treated us very nice and were very accommodating. Close to Huntington Beach and easy to access the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear WineyGma,  Thank you for your thoughtful review and kind compliments to our hotel! We are happy that you found our breakfast to be delicious and our team members to be very accommodating. If you are in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Wanted to go away with my gf and we decided on seal beach. Got online to research hotels and a very helpful chat popped up from Ayres. After some q and a decided on staying in seal beach at Ayers. Hotel was very clean, super convenient and we found the staff just delightful. Complimentary breakfast was awesome too. Place was quiet and very comfortable. The king sized bed was huge! (I loved it but my gf thought we weren‚Äôt close enough lol). I wholeheartedly endorse this place. Super close to the 405 and the beach. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear mikeconnors1,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay with us! We are delighted that you were satisfied with the service you received starting from the chat feature on our website to the interaction with team members at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional and comfortable stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Great spot with excellent and fresh cooked breakfast. Loved the scrambled eggs with spinach. Together with the hash browns, this was exceptional in the "breakfast included" market. The rooms are well appointed. The ADA rooms are well designed with safely textured floors and ample room for maneuvering. Well done and well beyond nominal ADA. Carpets are wheel chair friendly. So great facility, friendly helpful staff and great location. Sizable mall down the road with food and retail within 2 minutes. So all in all great spot to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Mike A,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast offerings and that you found our ADA accessible rooms to be well designed. If you return to the area, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. De Lugo General Manager

Summary: Will stay here again. Very clean room. Friendly check in. Good location and easy parking. We stayed 2 nights and it was very quiet considering it is right by the highway. Didn‚Äôt try the breakfast due to our schedule. Thanks!

My son competes in Jiu jitsu, & we love staying here close to the centers. Ayres is now our go to place to stay & relax. My family enjoys the pool, the workout center as well as the rooms. Excellent customer service!!! Love the Ayres & suite chains.....
Manager Response: Dear Angeline V,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your experiences here at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach! We are happy to know that you enjoy our pool, fitness center, and always receive excellent guest service from our team here. We look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Easy parking. A very clean hotel. Staff courtesy is exlempary, from the front desk to the housekeepers, quiet and across from the street from Spagahetini ... a perfect get-a-way weekend.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Steve F,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you found our hotel to be clean and our team members to have provided exemplary service. We hope to welcome you for another exceptional getaway soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights and I enjoyed every one of them! The customer service I experienced was amazing. On check in I was asked for my choice of floor. The hotel offers a happy hour reception with wine, beer and snacks.  One night the man at the counter referred me to local bars and local delivery places.   Very responsive to emails and sending me my receipt, they were also super friendly when I made my reservation.  The breakfast was delicious and the staff were very helpful and courteous.   I will stay here again, this time with family.
Manager Response: Dear BigHardWorkinDad,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review! We are glad to see that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our team members were able to assist in making it a great experience. If you are ever back in the area, we hope to welcome you again for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We stayed one night for a quick trip to town. The hotel is gorgeous inside. The rooms are very spacious. The couch made into a bed for the kids. The bathroom way big, shower was extra roomy tub style. The ceilings are super high and gorgeous. There was a breakfast buffet in the morning but we missed it because the beds were to comfy to leave by 9 lol. The stay was super friendly and attentive. We needed linens for the pull out bed and it came up quickly and she even offered to make it up for us.
Manager Response: Dear PartyofSixNM,  Thank you for your kind review on your short visit with us! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be a gorgeous and spacious place to stay. If you are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: The best choice in Seal Beach
Summary: I have stayed at the Ayres Seal Beach at least 30 times when visiting my parents at Leisure World.  I have never had a complaint or a less than satisfactory stay.  When the Ayres is sold out, I stay at other local hotels.  I have never had a satisfactory stay at any of them.    The Ayres is comfortable, reliable and friendly.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Michael S,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review! We are so happy to see that each of your stays with us here at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach have been satisfactory. It is with great pleasure that we are able to provide you with a comfortable and reliable place to stay. We look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Not sure how many other people are bothered by the mixing of cool light and warm light in the same area. This place mixed them in the room plus some of the lights had a high pitch buzzing sound.  It bothered me. Hotel was clean and  they provided a lovely breakfast included in the price.
Manager Response: Dear MominOC,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us! We are glad to see that you found our hotel to be clean and that you loved our complimentary breakfast. I would like to send my sincere apologies for any discomfort you may have experienced with the lights in the room. We value your feedback as it allows us to improve for future guests. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I regularly stay at Ayres Seal Beach when visiting my grandchildren.  Always very friendly and helpful staff.  Room is well appointed and bed is VERY comfortable. Very clean.  Breakfast, cafeteria style, is more than one could want. Convenient to freeways, Seal Beach and Long Beach.
Manager Response: Dear rcovell,  Thank you for your thoughtful review. We are glad to see that we are your chosen hotel to stay at while visiting your grandchildren in the area. It is with great pleasure that we provide you with a comfortable, clean, and convenient place to stay! We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The hotel was great. Very clean and conveniently located. The room was huge and very comfortable. I enjoyed the breakfast - very good selection and a chef preparing the eggs. Everybody was really nice.
Manager Response: Dear atma84,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy that you found our hotel to be comfortable and in a convenient area for your needs. We look forward to welcoming you back for another great stay in the near future!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We were out of our home for a termite tenting & were delighted to spend two nights at the clean, well appointed Ayres Hotel.  The complete breakfast & appetizers & drinks in the afternoon were an added bonus.  We will enthusiastically recommend Ayres in the future.
Manager Response: Dear surfdude2015,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay! We are glad to see that we were able to provide a comfortable place for you to stay during that time. In addition, we are grateful for your compliments to our hotel. If you are ever in need of a place to stay again, we hope to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Our go-to hotel while visiting the coast or family
Summary: The room decor has been updated since our last visit. We are originally from this area and we like the convenience it offers to the coast. The views are of the 405 freeway. The staff are helpful and friendly. Comfortable beds are always available at the Ayres locations.
Manager Response: Dear Gary S,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are happy to see that you found our beds to be comfortable and our team members helpful. Thank you for choosing us as your go-to hotel while in the area, we look forward to having you back with us soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Like most Ayres Hotels, this has a charming character. Clean and cozy. Friendly and efficient front desk staff. Comfortable bed and room. Very close to freeway but still manages to be quiet. Will definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Ene G,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you found our hotel to be cozy and comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back to stay with us soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: First of all, this hotel has easy access off the 405- quick trip to Long Beach and many other locations.   The hotel was booked for us, so I had no idea what to expect. It was absolutely beautiful inside. They advertise as a European boutique hotel, and the decor lived up to that hype.   The double queen room had plenty of room and a 40 + inch flat screen television. The restroom area was at front of the room, sink, small fridge, microwave, coffee maker, lots of room to dress, etc. The sleeping area had a desk, two chairs w a table, sliding mirrored closet, and plenty of room to move around.   The complimentary breakfast was amazing. The cooks, Gil and Yolanda, prepared fresh food on the grill behind the counter. Scrambled eggs, scrambled egg whites, hash browns, sausage patties
Manager Response: Dear twcsmom,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay! We are happy to see that you found our hotel to be beautiful and spacious. In addition, we are pleased to know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you for another satisfactory stay the next time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I would stay again.  Hotel is clean, beds comfy and staff friendly.  Location to freeway and Long Beach Airport is great.  Close to shopping and dining. Would stay here again.  Except for Jenn all staff friendly and helpful.  Good free breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Mary Jo C,  Thank you for your kind review on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be comfortable and in a stellar location for your needs. If you are ever back in the area, we hope to welcome you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We stay in this hotel whenever in the Los Alamitos area for work. Clean, Quiet, Beautiful, Nicely Furnished, Great Staff. Right across the street are great places to eat and just down the way you can find shopping (Target, Bed Bath & Beyond, etc...) and additional food choices. The rooms are beautiful and amenities are great.  The only suggestion I would have made to them is to update the shower head.  It was so awful I thought I was going to have to rinse my hair out using the bath faucet. No other complaints. Great Hotel!
Manager Response: Dear AMFSac,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay! We are delighted to see that you found our hotel to be beautiful and clean. I would like to send my sincere apologies for any inconvenience you have experienced in regards to the shower head in your room. Your feedback is valued and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This hotel is in a prime location for entertainment and shopping. The staff was thoughtful and professional. The rooms were spacious and quiet. I would absolutely recommend anyone in town to stay at this hotel.

Very nicely furnished. Great breakfast which we chose to take out to the lovely patio and enjoy the morning sun. The location is right off the 405. The staff was responsive to our needs. This is not a low budget motel, but I felt it was worth what we paid.
Manager Response: Dear flowergrowerDee,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and were able to enjoy it out on our patio. Your compliments to our hotel are greatly appreciated and we look forward to seeing you back with us sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Very clean. Very quiet. Delicious breakfast. Pancakes. French toast, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, fruit , yogurt, and pastries!Jacuzzi was relaxing.Housekeeping was excellent!We will be back for our away time!
Manager Response: Dear 797edr,  Thank you for your kind review! We are delighted to see that you found our hotel to be a clean and quiet place to stay. We look forward to welcoming you back soon for another exceptional experience soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This was our third time stating at the Ayres in Seal Beach.  Customer service is always top notch.  Nicely remodeled rooms with complimentary full breakfast.  Grounds are always kept very clean.  Front desk staff is always very welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear andreavS9097TI,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your experiences with us here at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach! We are pleased to hear that you have found our hotel to offer exceptional guest service and our guestrooms to be clean. We look forward to welcoming you back for another satisfactory stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I have stayed here for years. I‚Äôve decided the value is diminished considering the increased price point. Cooked to order omelets no longer available, happy hour availability decreased, friendliness of staff seemed absent this time, early check in $30.00 and just lower value for the price.  Breakfast staff just one person who was so busy keeping food supplied and doing the  kitchen work also didn‚Äôt allow him to have customer interaction.
Manager Response: Dear J W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay with us. I would like to send my sincere apologies for any discomfort you've experienced this time around. Your feedback on our guest interaction is greatly appreciated as it will allow us better serve our future guests. In addition, I am sorry for any inconvenience you encountered with the cook to serve omelets as well as evening reception, as those are services only offered on weekdays. We apologize for the lack of properly informing you. We hope this does not deter you from staying with us again as we hope to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: For families visiting parents in Leisure World Seal Beach the hotel is right across the street.  Easy access!! Excellent breakfast.  Friendly, helpful staff.  Close proximity to restaurants and the beach area.
Manager Response: Dear 1Sunbumm,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are happy to know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our hotel to be located in a great location while visiting your parents at Leisure World. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel staff are very friendly. My husband and I go to Spaghetinis  a lot it is very convienent to stay at the hotel just love it. Do not have to worry about getting in our car. Easy walking across the street.

Our room was very nice ,the people at the desk were very helpful ! Location for our needs were ideal.we were there for a New Years event across the street at spagattini‚Äôs ,it was a very good experience the accommodation,the concert etc. we will see you again !
Manager Response: Dear _gdvalentine,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review on your recent stay! We are glad that we were able to fulfill all of your needs here at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach. We look forward to seeing you back with us sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: We have been very happy with the Ayres Seal Beach
Summary: We were greeted warmly when we arrived. We were given a room on the second floor, quite a way from the elevator. The walk was rather long, but the room was very quiet. We were facing the road, but the windows kept out the noise.   The room was recently renovated. It was not a small room. The bathroom was pleasant, with the shower and toilet in the room with the door and the sink just outside. The room had a refrigerator and microwave. The beds were comfortable. There are plenty of outlets to charge all of our phones and devices. We had a room with 2 queen beds. The only thing that we missed was a second luggage stand.   The breakfast is ok. They scramble the eggs themselves before putting them into the steam tray. They served bacon on the weekend, then served both sausage links
Manager Response: Dear stephp,  Thank you for writing a thorough and thoughtful review on your recent stay with us! We are glad to see that you found our accommodations to be comfortable and your family was able to enjoy all of the amenities our hotel has to offer. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we look forward to seeing you back with us again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Ayers Seal Beach hotel is just 5 minutes away from family we visited for the holiday.  We enjoyed our stay and will stay again when we return to Seal Beach. We will get a room with 2 beds next time instead of the room with one bed and a sofa sleeper.  The sofa sleeper mattress is very thin...,ok for the kids but not for an adult.
Manager Response: Dear Margaret R,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay with us! We are happy that our hotel was in a great location for your needs and that you enjoyed your time with us during the holiday season. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Needed last-minute accommodations in coastal OC  during the 2017 Christmas holiday and found the Ayres Seal Beach on Yelp.  Not only did I get a great rate (even better than Ayres' website), the recently remodeled property, complimentary evening snacks and breakfast buffet all culminated in making our a stay a most pleasant surprise.  Will definitely return should I find myself in the OC again!

This Hotel was awesome! The room was beautiful and clean with our own private balcony and the price was right. You also get a free breakfast every morning. We definitely will stay at this Hotel again.

We came to seal beach for a New Year‚Äôs Eve event at a local restaurant ,we looked for the closest hotel to it so we did not have to travel ,we were suprised such a great place by chance ,the rooms were clean ,comfortable and all the people that were employees we met were friendly and helpful.we will definitely be back for another stay in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear George V,  Thank you for the kind review on your recent stay with us! We are happy to know that you found our rooms to be clean and comfortable. In addition, it is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional service for our guests, so we are happy that you experienced nothing short of that during your time with us. We would love to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I stay at Ayres Hotel, Seal Beach, CA several times a year.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Staff is always very friendly, professional, and helpful.  The amenities (fitness center, pool, jacuzzi, and guest laundry room) are always clean and well maintained.  Complimentary breakfast is wonderful.  There are several choices.
Manager Response: Dear Gail T,  Thank you for your kind review! We are thrilled to know that you have found stays with us to be comfortable and our team members to be both helpful and friendly. We definitely look forward to seeing you when you're back in the area again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: My family was very pleased with this hotel.  Price wise, about mid-tier, but spacious room, very comfortable bed, clean environment, and many positives.  We had a room with two beds, and it actually had a partition!!!  Free breakfast, I would say about average, but very friendly staff.  We had a minor issue, and they corrected within 10-min or so!!!  We were very happy.  There are lots of shops and restaurants, which was an extra value!!!  Beach and dock was within ~15 min driving distance as well.  I would recommend this place to my friends and family for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Soung-Phoenix,  Thank you for your thoughtful review on your recent stay with us! We are pleased to see that you had an enjoyable and comfortable experience at our hotel. Additionally, we are happy that we were able to tend to any inconveniences you've experienced in an efficient manner. If you and your family are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We were in town for a family Christmas Party. Our room was quiet, very nicely furnished and very comfortable. The Breakfast was an added bonus. Overall stay was great and we will be back. Another bonus is the free parking and location near many great stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Robert H,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy to see that you enjoyed a nice and comfortable stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This is my second time at the Ayres and I've been very satisfied both times.  Best complimentary breakfast around with cook present for special orders.  Room was clean and quiet with comfortable beds. Staff couldn't have been nicer.  Would recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Dave R,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on the stays you had with us at the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach! We are delighted to see that you were highly satisfied and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Very clean friendly professional  Didn‚Äôt like the breakfast but typical for hotels  Will stay again. Loved it. Wish we could have stayed longer. A lot to do near by. Very professional very clean. Easy to find
Manager Response: Dear Ann G,  Thank you for your kind review. We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel! It is great knowing that we were able to provide you with a comfortable place to stay in a great location! If you are ever back in the area, we would love to see you again.  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Beautiful rooms. Recently updated. Quiet.  Very nice staff. Near shopping and freeway. Haved stayed here many times when in area.  Comfortable beds. Breakfast included, coffee maker and mini fridge in room.
Manager Response: Dear Karen W,  Thank you for your kind review on your most recent stay with us! We are happy to see that you had an exceptional stay at our beautiful hotel and found our beds to be comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: We had a soccer tournament over the weekend and met some friends for dinner at Spaghetini's. Great location for both. The rooms were generous in size and the staff was very accommodating. The breakfast was tasty as well.
Manager Response: Dear 64ricm,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our rooms to be spacious and our team members to be very accommodating. It is with great pleasure that we provide the finest service to our valued guests. We hope to welcome you back for another exceptional stay soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: The room was great..king size bed was cery comfortable. Very clean. Great lightening ofr getting ready. Close to exits but was very quiet. Couldn't hear any other guest or street noise. Had a widow next to the pool but we couldn't hear the people outside which was great. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear patriciacastaneda,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review! We are happy to see that you had a comfortable and quiet stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the area for another exceptional stay!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Needed a room for the Thanksgiving holiday - Property was nicely appointed - Clean - Well located just off freeways - Included a substantial breakfast - Will certainly be staying at Ayres the next time I'm in Orange County
Manager Response: Dear tomsharp9,  Thank you for your kind and thoughtful review! We are so happy to know that we were able to provide you with an exceptional experience in a great location over the Thanksgiving holiday. We look forward to welcoming you back to the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach in the future!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Quaint hotel close to Cal State Long Beach
Summary: This hotel was incredibly quiet, especially since it is right off the 405 and Seal Beach Blvd.  The front desk staff was very helpful and rooms are pleasantly spacious.  There is a hot breakfast served every morning, with fresh eggs, sausage, bacon, potatoes, decent coffee, and and wonderful outside patio to enjoy it (also indoor seating).  The fitness center needs a facelift, as it only has one old treadmill and one bike, and some weights.  If you want to get in a cardio workout and someone else is in there, you have no alternatives and have to come back.  This is the only reason I don't give this property five stars.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay with us! We are so pleased to hear that you were satisfied with the spacious rooms and exceptional service we provide for our guests. Additionally, we appreciate your feedback regarding our fitness center as it will allow us to better serve our valued guests in the future. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Everything was good except,the breakfast was exactly the same for each day(Saturday+Sunday) very mediocre. The pictures on the website for the gym is not what the gym looked like in person. No weights at all.
Manager Response: Dear Maryjo777,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your most recent stay with us. We are happy to see that had an overall good stay with us. I would like to send my sincere apologies for our breakfast and fitness room not being to your liking. We appreciate your feedback as it allows us to better serve our valued guests. We hope to see you back with us soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: QUITE Good breakfast. Enjoyed the hot tub. Beds a little hard. AC kept shutting itself off during the night. Most hotels on motion sensors now a days which causes me to wake up because I'm hot. Once I got up moving around, AC came back on but now I'm awake and can't get back to sleep for a couple of hours
Manager Response: Dear samN9506OU,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on your recent stay with us. We are happy to see that you enjoyed our breakfast and hot tub. I would like to send my sincere apologies for any unpleasant encounters you experienced regarding the air conditioning unit during your time with us. We hope this does not deter you from staying with us again as we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Great service. Great breakfest. The decor is a little interesting but no real complaints. I would stay here again. They allowed us a late check out and let us print our boarding passes at no charge. The rooms were clean and very spacious. All of the staff was very accomidating as well.........................................................................

Had a fantastic stay here. Great front desk staff, so helpful. The rooms are well furnished and great size, bed was so  comfortable, and immaculate clean, a tribute to your cleaners. Breakfast was very tasty although we missed having the bacon at the weekend. We would diffently choose this hotel again if we were needing a hotel in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Sheilathemum,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review on your recent stay with us. We are pleased to know that your experience was fantastic and that you found our rooms to be immaculate. Your kind compliments to our hotel are greatly appreciated. Thank you again! If you are ever back in the area, we look forward to welcoming you!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: When we first arrived in town we had reservations with a different company's hotel.  After being in the room for 10 mins we started to notice that the room was filthy and the bed sheets had stains on it. We left there dissatisfied and had a horrible start to our trip.  We hopped online and found the Ayres hotel in Seal Beach. We walked into the hotel and were greeted at the front desk by a welcoming face who said his name was Sean Cutt. He was extremely helpful and found us a beautiful room on the third floor. Sean helped us go from a horrible start to our trip to a great one. Anyone looking for a hotel in town, you should heavily consider this one.  Not to mention they have a great included breakfast. The chef Gill produces consistently delicious breakfasts every morning. We
Manager Response: Dear Jessica S,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a thoughtful review on your recent stay with us. We are delighted to know that we were able to turn the start of your trip around to an amazing one! Your compliments on our hotel are deeply appreciated. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests. If you are ever back in the area, we would love to welcome you!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: This hotel was a pleasure to stay at.  Our room was spacious and lovely.  The breakfast buffet was also delicious.  They have a cook which prepares hash browns, bacon, sausage, and scrambled eggs.  No microwaved food.
Manager Response: Dear DPDWoods,  Thank you for your kind review on your most recent stay with us! We are glad that you enjoyed our breakfast offerings and you found your stay to be exceptional. We would love to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary Heading: Will Be staying here every time visiting Leisure world.Thank you for the wonderful breakfast we had in the morning
Summary: We chose another hotel last trip and there was no comparison.I am recommending this hotel to others considering coming to Orange County to stay.The bed was so comforterable and the way the room was decorated was so homey.
Manager Response: Dear lisawX5152SC,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to know that you have found our hotel to be a comfortable and quaint place to stay. Your compliments are greatly appreciated and thank you for recommending us to others. That is very thoughtful of you. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: WE stay there regularly and always feel well taken care of  The rooms are well done and the bathrooms CLEAN.  Hot breakfast everyday done by well-meaning people.  They have a computer in the lobby so that helps us.
Manager Response: Dear Kelli R,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a kind review. We take pride in caring for our guests, so we are pleased to know that you feel well-taken care of during your stays with us. In addition, we are happy to know that you enjoyed our accommodations and breakfast offerings. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: My husband and I were in town for a memorial service and needed a hotel close to transportation corridor and restaurants/shopping, etc. This is the place! Great facility right off the 405 Freeway in Seal Beach, but not noisy at all. Lovely room, great breakfast, and service was wonderful. Nice microwave, little fridge and coffee set-up, plus luxury soaps and shampoo/conditioner. Nice little sitting area so we were able to have a friend up to visit before we went to memorial. Ask for a courtyard view so you don't have to look at freeway and you're all set!
Manager Response: Dear lablover2go,  Thank you for such a thoughtful review on your most recent stay with us. We are glad to know that you found our rooms, service, and breakfast to be exceptional. Additionally, we are happy that you found our location to be perfect for all of your needs. Your compliments are greatly appreciated and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: Room was perfect! Trash outside west entrance over flowed for three days. No light at that entrance at night. Breakfast chef is very noisy and  somewhat unfriendly. Front desk was very helpful and kind.

This hotel is the best hotel I have stayed in. I‚Äôve traveled on leisure. I‚Äôve traveled as a flight attendant across the country. I haven‚Äôt experienced such class. Such friendly attentive staff in a long while. Ayres Seal Beach is right across the street from an excellent Jazz club/restaurant. Hotel within walking distance of a couple restaurants. But more within 2 Miles. You wake up to a experience a fantastic breakfast served in their special place on the main floor. The favorite part aside from the excellent room & service, was the request for a late checkout. ü§óüëèüèΩü§óüëèüèΩü§ó. It was granted and I was in heaven. Nice, classy, put you first hotel. Thank you Ayres family. Great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sherelle D,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a thoughtful and kind review. I am happy to see that our team members, services, and breakfast offerings have left you exceptionally satisfied. Thanks again for choosing the Ayres Hotel Seal Beach. We look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Steven A. de Lugo General Manager

Summary: I stay at the Ayres Hotel quite often. It‚Äôs always a great experience. Centrally-located and fairly-priced. A good find. The full breakfast is great each day. (Eggs are scrambled a little hard for my taste, but still good).
